gfplot 0.1.4

Reference

All functions

assign_areas()

Assign areas

bind_samples()

Join survey and commercial samples

boot_iphc()

Do bootstrap calculations on each IPHC Series

calc_iphc_full_res()

Do all the calculations for the IPHC survey.

calc_iphc_ser_AB()

Calculate Series AB and test if the scaled A and B are significantly different

calc_iphc_ser_all()

Calculate Series A, B, C and D from the IPHC data

compare_iphc_ser_A_D()

Compare Series A and D to see if A can be considered a relative index for the whole coast

compare_iphc_ser_B_C()

Compare Series B and C to see if A can be considered a relative index for the whole coast

countData1995

Count data for 1995 IPHC survey

countData1995rs

Count data for 1995 IPHC survey for RS stations

countData2013

Count data for 2013 IPHC survey

fit_cpue_index() predict_cpue_index() plot_cpue_index() tidy_cpue_index_coefs() plot_cpue_index_coefs() plot_cpue_index_jk()

Commercial CPUE index standardization

fit_cpue_index_tweedie() predict_cpue_index_tweedie() tidy_cpue_index_coefs_tweedie()

Commercial CPUE index standardization (Tweedie version)

data1996to2002

Set-by-set level data (with species counts) from 1996 to 2002.

f() get_most_common_level()

Force factors to be sequential within the positive or binary data sets for TMB

fit_cpue_index_glmmtmb()

Fit CPUE with glmmTMB

fit_inla()

Fit a spatial model with INLA

fit_length_weight()

Fit a length-weight model

fit_vb()

Fit a von Bertalanffy growth model

format_iphc_longest()

Format the longest IPHC time series index to agree with other surveys

get_all_iphc_set_counts()

Get and combine all the IPHC survey data for a given species

get_cpue_historic() get_cpue_historical()

Get all fishing catch and effort to calculate historic commercial CPUE

get_ssids() get_major_areas() get_management_areas() get_fishery_ids() get_species_groups() get_gear_types() get_age_methods() get_other_surveys() get_survey_sets() get_survey_samples() get_iphc_sets() get_iphc_sets_info() get_iphc_skates_info() get_iphc_hooks() get_commercial_samples() get_catch() get_cpue_spatial() get_cpue_spatial_ll() get_cpue_index() get_age_precision() get_survey_index() get_management() get_sara_dat() cache_pbs_data() cache_pbs_data_iphc()

Get PBS data

get_iphc_spp_name() check_iphc_spp_name() get_iphc_1995() get_iphc_1996to2002() get_iphc_2013()

Get early IPHC data from already-saved .rds files (can likely integrate into get-dat.R)

gfplot

gfplot package

hbll_grid

A 2km x 2km grid for the HBLL survey

hbll_n_grid

A 2km x 2km grid for the HBLL North survey

hbll_s_grid

A 2km x 2km grid for the HBLL South survey

iphc-spp-names.csv

Conversion from GFbio names to IPHC species names (for data not in GFbio)

iphc_get_calc_plot()

Get data, do calculations and plot longest series for the IPHC survey

pbs2dlmtool_data()

Convert groundfish PBS data to a DLMtool data object

pbs_areas

PBS groundfish areas

pbs_species

PBS groundfish species

plot_age_precision()

Plot ageing precision data

plot_ages()

Plot age frequency data

tidy_catch() plot_catch()

Plot catch data over time

plot_cpue_spatial()

Plot a map of commercial CPUE

plot_growth() plot_vb() plot_length_weight()

Plot von Bertalanffy or length-weight fits

plot_iphc_index()

Plot just the IPHC survey index, though works for all surveys

plot_lengths()

Plot length frequency data

fit_mat_ogive() plot_mat_ogive()

Fit and plot maturity ogives

tidy_maturity_months() plot_maturity_months()

Plot maturity frequency by month

plot_predictor_bubbles()

Make predictor level bubble plots

plot_sample_avail()

Plot sample availability

tidy_survey_index() plot_survey_index()

Plot survey relative biomass mass index

plot_survey_sets()

Plot the output from a geostatistical model of survey data

pop_samples

Example Pacific Ocean Perch biological samples from QCS.

pop_surv

Example Pacific Ocean Perch survey data from QCS in 2015

qres_tweedie() qres_binomial() qres_gamma() qres_gaussian() plot_qres_qq() plot_qres_histogram()

Quantile residuals for a Tweedie GLMM fit with glmmTMB

run_sql()

Run SQL

Station data for 1995 IPHC survey

setData1995rs

Station data for 1995 IPHC survey for RS stations

setData2013

Station data for 2013 IPHC survey

sim_cpue()

Simulate fake commercial CPUE data for examples and testing

fit_survey_sets()

Spatial modeling of survey data

survey_boundaries

Survey boundaries

theme_pbs()

A ggplot2 theme

tidy_age_precision()

Tidy PBS ageing precision data

tidy_ages_raw() tidy_ages_weighted() tidy_lengths_raw() tidy_lengths_weighted() tidy_comps()
